name: Modern Minimalist Desk Lamp
description: A sleek and modern desk lamp with adjustable brightness and a minimalist design. Perfect for any home office or study area. Made from high-quality aluminum.

name: Comfortable Ergonomic Office Chair
description: This ergonomic office chair provides excellent lumbar support and is fully adjustable. The breathable mesh back keeps you cool and comfortable all day.

name: Large Hardcover Notebook Set (3-Pack)
description: A set of three high-quality hardcover notebooks. Each notebook contains 200 pages of acid-free paper, perfect for journaling, note-taking, or sketching.

name: Stainless Steel Insulated Water Bottle
description: Keep your drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours with this double-walled, vacuum-insulated stainless steel water bottle. 32 oz capacity.
